message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $18,000. I believe this reflects the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,000 is significantly below my bottom line. I could consider letting it go for $15,000.  This is a very competitive offer considering its true value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. This is the maximum I can go.
